doc.field: Time Inc. Human Resources and Personnel Records
Time Inc. Human Resources and Personnel Records
Series III. Human Resources: Vice President: John R. Bingle Files
Series III. Human Resources: Vice President: John R. Bingle Files

These files were found housed together and the primary correspondent is John "Jay" R. Bingle, VP of Human Resources. His files include correspondence, memoranda, and reports regarding Time Inc. benefits, compensation, and policies.
